definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: Attached please find bank pay-in-slip(s) with total donation of HK$ .
sentences.chinese: 現附上張銀行存款收據，捐款額合共港幣元。

sentences.english: The US and Russia account for more than 90% of the world's nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 美國和俄羅斯合共擁有世界核武器中的90%。

sentences.english: Altogether 46 United College staff and their spouses joined this discounted health check-up packages.
sentences.chinese: 合共四十六位聯合書院教職員及配偶參加本計劃。

sentences.english: Tips of HK$20/pax for driver and tour guide are suggested.
sentences.chinese: 建議小費予司機及導遊合共每位HK$20。

sentences.english: Ifone side fails to observe the contract, the other side is entitled to cancel it.
sentences.chinese: 假如一方不實行合共協議，另一方有權終起折同。
